title: Submodule on second level fails to find itself in dev mode
body:
### Describe the bug

My project consists of parent pom with common dependencies and several submodules. When I run dev mode inside submodule on the first level (folder project/submodule) it starts successfully. When I do the same for submodule on the second level (folder project/something/submodule) it fails with error `The following artifacts could not be resolved: ${GAV of the submodule}`. This used to work before Quarkus 3.7

### Expected behavior

Application starts in dev mode

### Actual behavior

```
[INFO] Scanning for projects...
[INFO] 
[INFO] ----------< io.quarkus.ts.startstop:app-jakarta-rest-minimal >----------
[INFO] Building app-jakarta-rest-minimal 1.0.0-SNAPSHOT
[INFO]   from pom.xml
[INFO] --------------------------------[ jar ]---------------------------------
[INFO] 
[INFO] --- clean:3.2.0:clean (default-clean) @ app-jakarta-rest-minimal ---
[INFO] Deleting $EDITEDtest/app-jakarta-rest-minimal/target
[INFO] 
[INFO] --- quarkus:3.7.1:dev (default-cli) @ app-jakarta-rest-minimal ---
[INFO] Invoking formatter:2.22.0:format (default) @ app-jakarta-rest-minimal
[INFO] Processed 2 files in 518ms (Formatted: 0, Unchanged: 2, Failed: 0, Readonly: 0)
[INFO] Invoking impsort:1.8.0:sort (default) @ app-jakarta-rest-minimal
[INFO] Processed 2 files in 00:00.012 (Already Sorted: 2, Needed Sorting: 0)
[INFO] Invoking resources:3.3.1:resources (default-resources) @ app-jakarta-rest-minimal
[INFO] Copying 2 resources from src/main/resources to target/classes
[INFO] Invoking compiler:3.11.0:compile (default-compile) @ app-jakarta-rest-minimal
[INFO] Changes detected - recompiling the module! :source
[INFO] Compiling 2 source files with javac [debug target 17] to target/classes
[WARNING] system modules path not set in conjunction with -source 17
[INFO] Annotation processing is enabled because one or more processors were found
  on the class path. A future release of javac may disable annotation processing
  unless at least one processor is specified by name (-processor), or a search
  path is specified (--processor-path, --processor-module-path), or annotation
  processing is enabled explicitly (-proc:only, -proc:full).
  Use -Xlint:-options to suppress this message.
  Use -proc:none to disable annotation processing.
[INFO] Invoking resources:3.3.1:testResources (default-testResources) @ app-jakarta-rest-minimal
[INFO] skip non existing resourceDirectory /home/fedinsky/code/quarkus/refresh/quarkus-startstop/test/app-jakarta-rest-minimal/src/test/resources
[INFO] Invoking compiler:3.11.0:testCompile (default-testCompile) @ app-jakarta-rest-minimal
[INFO] No sources to compile
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[INFO] BUILD FAILURE
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[INFO] Total time:  2.347 s
[INFO] Finished at: 2024-03-12T17:24:24+01:00
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[ERROR] Failed to execute goal io.quarkus:quarkus-maven-plugin:3.7.1:dev (default-cli) on project app-jakarta-rest-minimal: Failed to run: Failed to resolve artifact io.quarkus.ts.startstop:app-jakarta-rest-minimal:jar:1.0.0-SNAPSHOT: The following artifacts could not be resolved: io.quarkus.ts.startstop:app-jakarta-rest-minimal:jar:1.0.0-SNAPSHOT (absent): Could not find artifact io.quarkus.ts.startstop:app-jakarta-rest-minimal:jar:1.0.0-SNAPSHOT -> [Help 1]
[ERROR] 
[ERROR] To see the full stack trace of the errors, re-run Maven with the -e switch.
[ERROR] Re-run Maven using the -X switch to enable full debug logging.
[ERROR] 
[ERROR] For more information about the errors and possible solutions, please read the following articles:
[ERROR] [Help 1] http://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/MAVEN/MojoFailureException

```

### How to Reproduce?

1. `git clone https://github.com/quarkus-qe/quarkus-startstop.git`
2. ` cd quarkus-startstop/`
3. `mkdir test`
4. `cp -r app-jakarta-rest-minimal/ test/` # to make sure they are identical
5. `cd test/app-jakarta-rest-minimal/`
6. `sed -i -e 's|>..<|>../..<|' pom.xml` # to have correct relative path
7. `mvn clean quarkus:dev -Dquarkus.version=3.7.1 # fails`
8. `mvn clean quarkus:dev -Dquarkus.version=3.6.4 # succeeds`

Running any of the commands above inside original `app-jakarta-rest-minimal/`always succeeds. Latest version (3.8.2) is also affected.

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

6.7.3-200.fc39.x86_64

### Output of `java -version`

Java version: 21.0.1, vendor: Eclipse Adoptium

### Quarkus version or git rev

3.7.1

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

Apache Maven 3.9.6 (bc0240f3c744dd6b6ec2920b3cd08dcc295161ae)

### Additional information

_No response_
